entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet watch run` watches the .git folder. #43817
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/main` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #43815
  • `dotnet build` results in "Unable to load the service index for source" and "Socket is not connected" #43814
  • [API Compat] Not targeting .NET 8 framework in versions 8.* #43801

PullRequests

Created

  • use SpecialFolder.UserProfile in few places #43826
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.404 #43824
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.307 #43823
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.111 #43822
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.428 #43821
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.136 #43820
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Add registry search for upgrade policy keys #43819

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #43786
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix typos #43730
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [DOCS] missing C++ requirements #43818
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix WriteSize() in BaseSerializer.cs #43810
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • WebSdk: new 'OneDeploy' publish method #43690
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK

Updated

  • Update manpages for 9.0 #43776
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix port when fall back to http #43620
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Change from "sln" to "solution" as primary, and add "sln" as alias #43607
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Document for new feature
  • Add Lock comments for Windows setup #43699
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow for older Windows SDK projection packages without profiles to build on .NET 9 #43795
    untriaged, Area-WindowsSDK
  • Disable baseline manifest generation #43797
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Fix baseline manifest version for RTM branding #43737
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Merge the net10 runtime, aspnetcore, windowsdesktop, and arcade codeflows #43070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Introduce a join point for SdkLocator and VSTemplateLocator #43723
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Join assets from verticals in the final join point #43627
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Multi arch containers #43085
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Multi arch containers prerequisites #43794
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Add code to containers check to allow users to silence it #42501
    untriaged, Area-Containers
